name: Emackin Social Network
description: emackin is an online social network
overview:
Emackin is an online social network looking to rival sites like plenty of fish and zoosk by giving users the relaxed vibe and user friendly features we offer on our site.

Emackin is aim to go after the youth audience because of mainly the name “emackin” e which means “electronic” and mackin which means “flirting” which young people love to do.

We are focus to provide and safe buy yet fun place where people can make new friends and hopefully find that special someone, We list all countries,states and cities around the world so finding someone real close to where a user lives is very likely.
